name: OTT details
description: Get Streaming details of Movie and TV Shows. We support 150+ Streaming platforms in US and India such as HBO, YouTube, Netflix , Primve Video, Hotstar, Hulu, etc . (use our OTT Providers endpoint to get the full list OTT providers we support) . In additon to streaming info we also provide basic details on any given movie title.

api_methods.name: Params
api_methods.description: Get array of values that can be used as params in Advanced Search .

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: input 'genre' or 'language' to get array of genre or languages that can be used as filter in advanced search .

utterances.utterance: What are the available genres for advanced search?
Can you list the languages supported in the advanced search?
Show me the list of genres I can use to filter movies and TV shows.
What languages can I filter by when searching for content?
Provide the array of genres available for advanced search.
List all the languages that can be used as filters in the advanced search.
What are the genre options for filtering movies and TV shows?
Can you give me the list of languages for advanced search?
Show me the genres I can use to refine my search for movies and TV shows.
What are the language filters available in the advanced search?
